author: Absolute leader
more: Do you want to know more about the sotory about this fictious culture
quote: this project has been started by an individual with average intelligence and personality, so there shouldn't be any issues to connect with the public, what could go wrong?
text1:
The Terluzvan union is a micronation based in a fictious society.
Located in south America, the same society is part of a fictious universe named "hexanthus" wich means '16 golden things'. this project dont search a way to reach true independence or be a real nation only want to develop a new society form.
text2: A micronation is a small nation without recognition or real autonomy, thus Terluzva neither is recognized by any country wich is a ONU member nor it enjoys autonomy from any government, it is only a fictional national-entity, or rather a micronation, with is own micro culture and micro-organization.
he3: What is the Terluzvan union society?
text3: The Terluzvan society, is supossed to be a utopic an over-modernized society in a united South America under a unique regime, however, its government structure and culture are very different from what we exprience in our everyday lives in real world; to sumarize, if we believe in a omnipotent God they do not believe in any traditional god, if we speak our actual languages they have another very different language, if we live under presitenial states, they live in neo-monarchists states.
text4: The first flag is the official flag of our nation, the flag represent the origin of our country through the rhombus wich means the island where come the ancerters of our nation named 'Aurora Islands', also represent the intelligence with the blue color and the resilicience with the yellow color, there are two circles wich are the Sirius star reflected by the ocean. The Sirius star also appear in another symbol.
text5: The Sirius Star help the ancesters to travel through a long path from Oceania to The Americas and therefore the nation is not alone there are more nations from the same ancesters, those nations are lost for now.
text6:
The people in Terluzva micronation dont speak any know language because they have their own language named padot, which means "Language of thoughts", this language is try to unify all Terluzvan nations.
Anexinism is the religion of the pre-Terluzvan nations and Terluzva current entity, the religion don't have any god, there is a omnipotent entity know as "Zhed" wich means superior deithy, the soul don't exist, there is essence inside every living being, every personality and own characteristics are manifestations of the essence, in other words, we don't exist only the essence in every body.
post_1_he1: The born of a micronation: Terluzva, the futurist micronation
post_1_text1: The country barely have 1 month of existence officially founded at 6 October of 2024. Even this have a bad made promotion video on Youtube, The page had a slow updating due external problems and time use; however, those problems has been sucessfully managed to avoid work delays. The main reason to create this micronation was for fun but due the current global problems the need to create a "more peacefull country" start to born, and these are the reason now the micronation exist.
post_1_text2: Also born the gains to have a more modernized religion to the current thoughts, even there are more own concepts and traits that are put on the articles of the Terluzva main website’s pages that explain every detail.
post_1_text3: It is not an easy task to create a "serious" micronation from the scratch, cause it is necessary to think details to give more sense and more coherence to avoid a quick dissolution. There no exists economic reasons or political, only there is the reason of prove the existence of a “utopic” society with no annoy any group or real country.
post_1_text4: The seriously do not pretend give indepedentist vibes, only wants to give a peacefull vibe for the people who search a place more calm, also this dont pretend to be an emotional bunker, intead, it only think to create a auto sustainable group able to grown until unthinking things such as astronomical investigation.
